Hero.description: Main landing page hero with animated headline and status badge.

Search.description: Global inventory scanner with MapPin and Calendar inputs.

Features.description: Grid of system capabilities (EU261, Market Sniper, Stealth Concierge).

WorldMap.description: Animated globe showing operational intelligence network.

CTA.description: Final call to action with large italic typography.

Navbar.description: Sticky header with logo, navigation links, and theme toggle.

Footer.description: Site footer with copyright and legal links.

Blog.description: Elite travel blog feed with high-impact visuals and AEO-optimized cards.

best_practices: Always use 'use client' for components with motion or hooks.
Favor semantic sections with descriptive IDs for smooth scrolling.
Maintain 0.8s - 1s transition durations for motion.div elements.
Strictly adhere to 'primary' and 'accent' colors for highlights.
Use font-black and italic for OMEGA brand headlines.
